blog.name: homosexualearthworm
blog.title: why do i love this show so much
blog.description: Kate. 26. Lesbian. Midwest. Mostly Andi Mack but also just whatever. (Moreso “whatever” since it’s a hiatus and the show is canceled! This is just kind of slowly becoming my personal ig)

summary: 31 Days of Andi Mack #3 - Favorite Episode
title: 31 Days of Andi Mack #3 - Favorite Episode
body:
Haven’t participated in this yet and probably won’t do this every day, but I just rewatched my favorite episode today and I have feelings about it, so

It’s 2x12, We Were Never. This is the only episode that’s actually made me cry. Obviously the big plot points in this are Andi and Jonah “not being official” or whatever and Buffy’s mom returning. But the Bex storyline is what makes this my favorite episode.

Bex graduates beauty school. Bex had a really non traditional educational path (it’s unclear if she was able to finish high school or not? But as a high school dropout myself, I obviously headcanon that she ended up leaving school and getting a GED) and just seeing her succeed in a career path she’s trying to build for herself was so emotional for me. 

The episode came out a few months after I graduated college, and, like I said earlier, I dropped out of high school (due to mental health problems and some dumb teenage angsty bullshit) and my parents didn’t expect much from me and I didn’t expect much from me and just felt like a huge disappointment for so long. And UGH Bex is just so relatable to me here. 

Anyway, so this episode aired soon after my college graduation (the first graduation I’d ever had) and seeing CeCe and Ham say that they were proud of Bex and hugging her…. ah. I just. I sob every time I watch it. 

Obviously tyrus is the main reason I watch Andi Mack but Bex is just ssoooooo important to me as well.

blog.description: cyrus tj and amber will dominate

summary: so this is a theory I had in the middle of history class while learning about cyrus the great. It might be a bit much for disney...
body:
slightly plausible theory

so this is a theory I had in the middle of history class while learning about cyrus the great. It might be a bit much for disney but it’s not impossible.

this happens right, and tj may or may not be jealous but does something or says something , not violent but it’s not just a jealous look

The police needed to get involved with whatever happened ( it could be a misunderstanding or blonde boy lied about something? ) and Cyrus is there, TJ isnt but he should be. This could be because TJ was scared or something or bailed out, for some reason TJ isnt there but he should be. then this

and then this happens because TJ wasn’t there when Cyrus was talking to the police officer and he feels betrayed maybe? Maybe Cyrus nearly got in trouble? For some reason TJ wasn’t there and for some reason Cyrus is upset. I know i’m probably thinking too much into this but it’s not impossible. Unlikely but not impossible.

summary:
Day 3. Favorite Episode?
i’m actually gonna have to look this one up, hold on. 
...
okay so i have two answers for this. the...
body:
Day 3. Favorite Episode?

i’m actually gonna have to look this one up, hold on.

…

okay so i have two answers for this. the first is my favorite now that i’ve seen the proceeding episodes and the other was my favorite to watch the first time (i think).

  1. Home Away From Home: “HAFH” is my favorite episode to go back and watch. In the episode “Mama” we learn the reason Bex left was because Andi called Cece mama instead of Bex. I love watching “HAFH” back because it’s the first time Andi ever calls Bex mom and it’s cute to see how excited Bex is + to know that there was more to her excitement adds so much more.
  2. The Snorpion: “TS” is (i think) my favorite episode (from the first watching) because it gave more depth/another side to amber (also when i started shipping ambi lol). at the beginning it shows her being vulnerable, then during the sleepover she’s really nice + having fun. and it shows she doesn’t like being a bully + she understands why her friends don’t like her & she acknowledges that her actions are wrong. then when they go to the carnival + jonah calls, it shows her instant change & the power he or their relationship had over her.

neither of these really explains why they’re my fave but idrc. they’re basically my faves because (1) my fave female characters and (2) character development

summary:
31 Days of Andi Mack Day 3
What’s your favorite episode?
Favorite episode? Is it sad that I knew this off the top of my head and...
body:
31 Days of Andi Mack Day 3

What’s your favorite episode?

Favorite episode? Is it sad that I knew this off the top of my head and that this is the only episode I have rewatched? Head over Heels, baby. Give me that Muffy running content and angst. On another note this was the episode where Muffy took a sharp turn and fell off a cliff, but it’s also the best Muffy episode. Sigh. Also, don’t forget Cyrus’s terrible screenwriting and Bex’s wise advice. I just love this episode :)

summary: When Andi gets “the talk” from Bex + Bowie
body:
When Andi gets “the talk” from Bex + Bowie

Bex: being way to cavalier about all her past “exploits” using words that are most definitely made up

Bowie: honestly just embaressed to be here. Doesn’t even want to have the talk with Bex.

Bex: she brought out a doll and starts pointing. Where did she get an anatomically correct doll? The internet? The internet.

Bowie: talks about love and feelings

Bex: talks about her first time

Bowie: blushing profusely because of course it was also his first time


Andi: “You guys know Celia and Pops already talked to me about this years ago? Celia gave my pamphlets. Here, let me get them for you. It sounds like you guys don’t really know how this stuff works either”

Bowie: (under his breath) “well we made YOU”

tags: I didn't do anything for girls week today and I feel bad because I love bex :^((
this is my way of making up for it in some form
title: andi mack asks (girls edition)
body:
send a character to my askbox so I can answer a question about the character and about myself! reblog for your followers to do the same!
andi: what storyline with andi do you want the show to explore? how would you feel if you were in the same family-based situations as andi?
buffy: what has been your favorite emotional buffy scene? what sports do you play?
amber: how do you feel about amber’s redemption? what does someone have to do to gain your trust?
iris: if iris could come back for one more episode, what would you want her to do? has anyone ever broke your heart?
natalie: do you wish natalie had longer scenes? what do you watch on youtube?
bex: what’s your favorite headcanon about teenage bex? where is your favorite place to travel?
cece: what’s your favorite cece line? what’s your favorite cereal?
pat: what scenes do you want to see involving pat? how important is your family to you?
leslie: how do you think leslie would react to her son coming out? are you interested in psychology?
and a bonus denise: would you let denise eat the cookie off of the floor? would you eat the cookie off of the floor?

casey. andi mack sideblog

main blog

tags: i spent way too long on this and still don't know what my fave ep is
summary: day three! favorite episode?  i literally have no idea what my favorite episode is, so i'm just gonna list some that i like a...
body:
day three! favorite episode?

i literally have no idea what my favorite episode is, so i’m just gonna list some that i like a lot

were we ever: has my favorite scene in it (i’ll go into more detail on day nine) and i love the whole plot of them taking direct action to get the dress code changed and cyrus having to put aside his desire to have an amazing school picture and stand his ground in the protest instead. it addresses ridiculous school dress codes, taking a stand/protesting for a cause you believe in, and the issues of andi and jonah’s current relationship

miniature gulf: bc i’m tyrus trash and we get a deeper look into both tj and cyrus as characters and i love that

keep a lid on it: honestly just surprised me in multiple ways, which i love for shows to do. cyrus’ revelation about his crush on jonah genuinely made me gasp and go ‘ohhh damn’ and also made me make the switch to fully shipping tyrus lol. ham wanting to leave and travel on his own surprised me as well. I also loved buffy coming back, and there’s some good bandi in there too ;)

the cake that takes the cake: i feel bad loving this episode since jonah isn’t in it but i did really love this ep. maybe just because it’s the most recent ep and i’ve had loads of time to dwell on it and rewatch it but i love andi and bex’s relationship so much and this episode displays it really well. i also love buffy and tj’s game and his apology (obviously, as its my blog url and header) and the look back is iconic and i’ll never get over it
